title: What To Expect In The 2016 Presidential Announcement Season
teaser: With Jeb Bush signaling he's likely to run for president in 2016, it's another sign that the presidential announcement season is underway. Here's a look at who has jumped in the race early and what to expect in the coming months.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
